message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $140. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $130 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $135.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $132.50. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I hear you and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I can't quite go down to $132.50, but how about we settle at $134? It's just a little bit more than your offer and would still be a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $134 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $133. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
